cyclone.name: KATIA
cyclone.current_location: about 215 mi E of Tampico, Mexico and 195 mi NNE of Veracruz, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to turn southwest and track toward the central Veracruz coast of Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Warning: north of Cabo Rojo to Rio Panuco and south of Laguna Verde to Puerto Veracruz (Mexico)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Cabo Rojo to Laguna Verde (Mexico)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Veracruz coastline and adjacent Bay of Campeche shorelines
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty northerly winds well below tropical-storm force possible, otherwise none significant
